patterns: why upr?
is upr number 1 university?
why should i choose upr university?
why upr is good for me?
why should i apply at upr university?
why upr university?
responses: The University of Poonch, is a public research university located in Rawalakot, AJ&K, Pakistan. The university is modelled on international standards with a strong focus on the scientific advancement of the nuclear science-related STEM fields and medical sciences.Founded in 1989 as Agriculture faculty from the sponsorship of the AJ&K university in response to support and manage the Agriculture infrastructure in the country, the institute started its educational activities with the affiliation of AJ&K University, and became Centre for agriculture studies in 1990â€” the center gained its new name and became independent as public university in 2012. In 2015, the UPR was granted the status of a doctorate degree awarding institute. UPR is based on a 150 acres (0.61 km2; 0.23 sq mi) campus and has around 135 full-time faculty members.As of 2023, Higher Education Commission rated UPR as the 4th leading  university in Pakistan. The QS World University Rankings ranked it as 400th worldwide while QS Asia University Rankings ranked it as 5th in Pakistan, 189th overall in Asia in 2022. It is ranked 47th in QS top 50 under 50. Located at:Hajira road, Shamsabad Rawalakot AJ&K
